sentence.Network_en: To us this oracular remark seemed to herald Hitler.
sentence.Network_cn: 这番玄妙深奥的话在我们看来仿佛预示着希特勒的来临.

sentence.Network_en: His sister went away ruminating on this oracular speech of his.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的妹妹只得在这一席庄严的至理名言中,默默退出屋子.

sentence.Network_en: With this oracular sentence Ben was well satisfied.
sentence.Network_cn: 对这神圣的裁决,本相当满意.
